mapper.select:
select count(1) from user_info where 1 = 1
and name = #{name}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info (id, openid, role_code, name, job_number, sex, age, mobile, telephone, identity_card, education, birthday, position, address, student_id, relationship, is_register, remark, create_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{role_code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identity_card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{student_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relationship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_register,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
